page.title: 17Technology in Wootton Homes.
page.content:
From the questionnaire which we sent out we found that nearly every family had a colour television, washing machine, refrigerator and vacuum cleaner. Most of them also had a freezer and a music centre. About half had videos,computers and tumble driers. About a fifth had dishwashers and microwave ovens. It was noticeable that all these appliances work on electricity. The questionnnaire also showed that nearly every family had a car.
In the future we think that there will be more remote controlled videos and better and smalller microwaves. We think that there might be moving stairs in the house and electric doors which you can just walk up to and they open.
